name: Shamanic or Reiki Healing Session
description:
Shamanic healing interventions offer powerful avenues for directly accessing, clearing, healing and re-informing old traumas, souls contracts, ancestral patterns and other powerful energies imprinted on our luminous energy field, sometimes for many lifetimes.  While healing is a journey, shamanic sessions seek to find the imbalances at their root cause, rather than working backwards from the presenting issues.  This by its very nature, tends to promote deep, lasting, transformation shifts that help us heal more quickly.  Shamanic healing is also focused on restoring personal power, and removing unwanted energies that contribute to our loss of power.

It is up to each person to set their clear intention and commitment for their own personal healing journey.  As a practitioner, I am here to support you in honouring that commitment to yourself.  By creating and holding a safe and sacred space, the luminous body can transmute heavy energies back to sources of light and power.  Our entire being is then informed in new ways, leading us to new levels of awareness, greater states of health and well-being.  As we are sourced more and more from our wholeness and less and less from our wounds, we step more fully into our personal power and potential.

During sessions, you remain fully clothed, and lie on a massage table, or sometimes work is done on the floor or the ground if we are working outdoors.  There is gentle touch to the body for some of the work, and other forms of energy work and body work may be integrated into your session.  The work is always conducted with the deepest respect for you and your process, in the safety, protection and grace of Sacred Space, where Spirit is invited to work on your behalf. The sessions last from 1 hour to 2 hours.

Illuminations

Many of my shamanic sessions include an Illumination – working with one of the stones from my mesa – and with your luminous energy field, and the Luminous Lineages, to deeply clear one or more chakras that is holding “hucha” heavy energies.  This gentle but powerful process, can clear lifetimes of energy sludge from your chakras.  It’s called an Illumination, because when the clearing is complete, the chakra is “illuminated” – reinformed with Divine Light.  When I begin an illumination on a chakra, it is most often spinning slowly or not at all – a sign of a clogged, blocked chakra.  When the illumination is complete all the chakras are spinning clockwise, full of energy and light, once again sourcing the luminous and physical bodies with life force energy.

name: Palo Santo Sticks
description: Palo Santo Incense 2 oz, med bag. Palo Santo is a aromatic wood from the Amazon that is used for clearing heavy energy and calling the ancestors. Fair-Trade and Sustainably harvested.

name: Custom Handmade Personal Medicine Bag
description:
Smoke Deerskin leather with aventurine beads and copper butterfly bead sewn in the seams with real sinew. 2 inches wide and 2.5 inches long without fringe...Copper Bead, Opal Glass and a Copper Butterfly Bead on top flap with four-strand braid necklace. 

This one collects the light into the heart chakra to aid you in your expression of unconditional love into the world. It is call Heart's Flight and it is SOLD....

Walk in Beauty, 
Samantha

This Bag is now SOLD - but if you like it, let me know and I will custom make a bag just for you, give me colors and any animals that resonate with you. Email me at reiknosis@lawrenceh.ca

name: Munay-Ki Rites One Class Session Fee
description: Munay-Ki Rites are conferred in four class sessions to receive all Rites. The class is held in SE Calgary from usually 1PM to 4PM, after the first class (Rites 1&2 Healers Rites and Bands of Power) we co-create a schedule for the next 3 Rites over the next two months or so.

name: Munay-Ki Class Fee for all Four Classes (All Rites)
description: The Munay-Ki Rites are conferred in four class sessions to receive all Rites. If you want to pre-pay all class sessions you save $20, and I will co-create a schedule with you, even if it is outside of the group class session schedule.
